assessment_item.subject: Social Studies
assessment_item.title: ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ ವೇತನ ಪಡೆಯುವವರು ಅಥವಾ ಒಂದು ನಿಯಮಿತ ಆದಾಯ ಹೊಂದಿರುವರು ಈ ಖಾತೆ ತೆರೆಯುತ್ತಾರೆ.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ ವೇತನ ಪಡೆಯುವವರು ಅಥವಾ ಒಂದು ನಿಯಮಿತ ಆದಾಯ ಹೊಂದಿರುವರು ಈ ಖಾತೆ ತೆರೆಯುತ್ತಾರೆ.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

ಉಳಿತಾಯ ಖಾತೆ 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1989"},{"text":"

ಆವರ್ತ ಠೇವಣಿ ಖಾತೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1990"},{"text":"

ನಿಶ್ಚಿತ ಠೇವಣಿ ಖಾತೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2000"},{"text":"

ಚಾಲ್ತಿ ಖಾತೆ

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:2005"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"ಸಾಮಾನ್ಯವಾಗಿ ವೇತನ ಪಡೆಯುವವರು ಅಥವಾ ಒಂದು ನಿಯಮಿತ ಆದಾಯ ಹೊಂದಿರುವರು ಈ ಖಾತೆ ತೆರೆಯುತ್ತಾರೆ.
